first.content: My darling! It is good to see you.| I have much to tell.

fruitless.content: It seems out latest trial was once again [b][url=Berries]fruitless[/url][/b].

fruitless_overflow.content: I felt the urge when dealing with a patient just yesterday. A shame.

what_happened.content: Same as ever, I see blood, I am sent into a rage! I barely contained myself this time. It was only luck I found a stray dog.

notice_difference.content: None at all, I'm afraid. This time it happened at night, which was lucky for me.

give_up.content: I think it is well past time for us to give up on our quest. There is no cure for vampirism, except the blade.

next_time.content: The next time I go mad, how do you know it will subside with [b][url=Dandy]sunlight[/url][/b]? No.

next_time_overflow.content: I lived a good life, and a wonderful afterlife too. But this charade cannot continue.

my_friend.content: And you are mine. I have trusted no other with my secret, is that not proof enough? I ask you alone to help me.

town_doctor.content: Ah, oui? The town does not need a killer!

options: You're asking me to abandon my principles

ask_much.content: You're very sharp, so very sharp. Yet you refuse to use the gifts bestowed upon you. My scalpel decides where to cut and saves many lives. You do not.

try_more.content: There is much more you can try. You can do much more with your magic than I ever could with my medical knowlegde. Why do you deny yourself your potential?

options: You ask me to be a tyrant?
I can't cure a broken leg with a potion
You ask me to be a tyrant?

scalpel_code.content: Non, my code decides the action of the scalpel, I am merely an [b][url=Conch]instrument[/url][/b] in it's quest.

scalpel_code_overflow.content: My scalpel saves many lives, I end lives. When the scalpel can act no furhter, I take over and do as I see fit.

leg_potion.content: You and I do the same thing. I heal the leg so the farmer can work again.

leg_potion_overflow.content: You help seamstresses who want to sleep less, and dock workers who want to lift more. This [b][url=Feather]weight[/url][/b] you bear, for what?

be_tyrant.content: I have known many tyrants, ruthless, headstrong, lovers and fighters to the last.

be_tyrant_overflow.content: You are no tyrant, which is why I ask you to act. Who better to help [b][url=Beetle]those in need[/url][/b] than one who knows thier plight?

options: My code demands giving people what they ask for.
I'm not going to kill anyone.
My duty is not to make judgments of what is asked of me.
I'm not going to kill anyone.

final.content: I do not wish to argue with you, you always win. I will come back tomorrow and we will continue, just as we are now, Didi.
